description:
Facebook marketing can seem like a mystery to salon owners and hairdressers. It shouldn't be, because it's really that not that difficult if you know a few simple tactics.

This easy to follow course is designed to get salon professionals using the power of Facebook to maintain and build their business. This course is designed to take the difficulty out of setting up and using Facebook Ads for marketing your salon. It is broken down into easy to understand training modules that include:

  1. Understanding the 3-step process for marketing your salon
  2. What salons should know about Facebook's algorithm
  3. How to engage your Facebook audience
  4. How to create your salon's Facebook business page
  5. Step by step on how to create Facebook Ads
  6. How to Split Test your Facebook Ads
  7. How to use Facebook's analytics to gage success

Once you complete this course, you will be able to easily start using Facebook to drive additional business to you and/or your salon.

The course is laid out with the salon professional in mind. Please take a look at the course curriculum below.

This course is best for those salons just getting started with Facebook Ads.
title: Salon Quickstart Guide to Facebook Ads
